trans-unit.source: Provides a collection of <see langword="static" /> methods that return information about the common language runtime environment.
trans-unit.target: 提供傳回 Common Language Runtime 環境的資訊之 <see langword="static" /> 方法的集合，。

trans-unit.source: This example shows how to call many of the methods defined by the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.RuntimeEnvironment> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例示範如何呼叫所定義之方法的許多<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.RuntimeEnvironment>類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.RuntimeEnvironment" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.RuntimeEnvironment" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The assembly to test.
trans-unit.target: 要測試的組件。

trans-unit.source: Tests whether the specified assembly is loaded in the global assembly cache.
trans-unit.target: 測試指定的組件是否會載入至全域組件快取。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the assembly is loaded in the global assembly cache; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果組件會載入至全域組件快取，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates calling the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.RuntimeEnvironment.FromGlobalAccessCache%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何呼叫 <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.RuntimeEnvironment.FromGlobalAccessCache%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.RuntimeEnvironment> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.RuntimeEnvironment>類別。

trans-unit.source: Returns the directory where the common language runtime is installed.
trans-unit.target: 傳回安裝 Common Language Runtime 所在的目錄。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the path to the directory where the common language runtime is installed.
trans-unit.target: 含有安裝 Common Language Runtime 所在之目錄路徑的字串。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates calling the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.RuntimeEnvironment.GetRuntimeDirectory%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何呼叫 <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.RuntimeEnvironment.GetRuntimeDirectory%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.RuntimeEnvironment> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.RuntimeEnvironment>類別。

trans-unit.source: for accessing files and folders.
trans-unit.target: 用來存取檔案和資料夾。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.PathDiscovery" />
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.PathDiscovery" />

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the desired class.
trans-unit.target: 所需類別的識別項。

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the desired interface.
trans-unit.target: 所需介面的識別項。

trans-unit.source: Returns the specified interface on the specified class.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指定類別上的指定介面。

trans-unit.source: An unmanaged pointer to the requested interface.
trans-unit.target: 要求之介面的 Unmanaged 指標。

trans-unit.source: This method is similar to calling the method on the interface that represents this runtime.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法很類似，表示這個執行階段的介面上呼叫方法。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the supported combinations for `clsid` and `riid`.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示支援的組合`clsid`和`riid`。

trans-unit.source: CLSID_CorMetaDataDispenser
trans-unit.target: CLSID_CorMetaDataDispenser

trans-unit.source: IID_IMetaDataDispenser, IID_IMetaDataDispenserEx
trans-unit.target: IID_IMetaDataDispenser, IID_IMetaDataDispenserEx

trans-unit.source: CLSID_CorMetaDataDispenserRuntime
trans-unit.target: CLSID_CorMetaDataDispenserRuntime

trans-unit.source: IID_IMetaDataDispenser, IID_IMetaDataDispenserEx
trans-unit.target: IID_IMetaDataDispenser, IID_IMetaDataDispenserEx

trans-unit.source: CLSID_CorRuntimeHost
trans-unit.target: CLSID_CorRuntimeHost

trans-unit.source: IID_CorRuntimeHost
trans-unit.target: IID_CorRuntimeHost

trans-unit.source: CLSID_CLRRuntimeHost
trans-unit.target: CLSID_CLRRuntimeHost

trans-unit.source: IID_CLRRuntimeHost (not valid for the common language runtime that is provided by the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]), IID_CLRRuntimeHost3
trans-unit.target: IID_CLRRuntimeHost (不適用於所提供的 common language runtime [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)])，IID_CLRRuntimeHost3

trans-unit.source: CLSID_TypeNameFactory
trans-unit.target: CLSID_TypeNameFactory

trans-unit.source: IID_TypeNameFactory
trans-unit.target: IID_TypeNameFactory

trans-unit.source: CLSID_CLRStrongName
trans-unit.target: CLSID_CLRStrongName

trans-unit.source: IID_CLRStrongName
trans-unit.target: IID_CLRStrongName

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.RuntimeEnvironment.GetRuntimeInterfaceAsIntPtr%2A> is similar to the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.RuntimeEnvironment.GetRuntimeInterfaceAsObject%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.RuntimeEnvironment.GetRuntimeInterfaceAsIntPtr%2A> 類似於<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.RuntimeEnvironment.GetRuntimeInterfaceAsObject%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: [IUnknown::QueryInterface](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=144867) failure.
trans-unit.target: [IUnknown::QueryInterface](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=144867) 失敗。

trans-unit.source: requires full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 需要完全信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任或安全性透明程式碼。

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the desired class.
trans-unit.target: 所需類別的識別項。

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the desired interface.
trans-unit.target: 所需介面的識別項。

trans-unit.source: Returns an instance of a type that represents a COM object by a pointer to its <see langword="IUnknown" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: 傳回型別的執行個體，用其 <see langword="IUnknown" /> 介面的指標來表示 COM 物件。

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the specified unmanaged COM object.
trans-unit.target: 表示指定之 Unmanaged COM 物件的物件。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.RuntimeEnvironment.GetRuntimeInterfaceAsObject%2A> is similar to the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.RuntimeEnvironment.GetRuntimeInterfaceAsIntPtr%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.RuntimeEnvironment.GetRuntimeInterfaceAsObject%2A> 類似於<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.RuntimeEnvironment.GetRuntimeInterfaceAsIntPtr%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: [IUnknown::QueryInterface](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=144867) failure.
trans-unit.target: [IUnknown::QueryInterface](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=144867) 失敗。

trans-unit.source: requires full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 需要完全信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任或安全性透明程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Gets the version number of the common language runtime that is running the current process.
trans-unit.target: 取得正在目前處理序中執行的 Common Language Runtime 的版本號碼。

trans-unit.source: A string containing the version number of the common language runtime.
trans-unit.target: 含有 Common Language Runtime 的版本號碼的字串。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates calling the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.RuntimeEnvironment.GetSystemVersion%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何呼叫 <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.RuntimeEnvironment.GetSystemVersion%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.RuntimeEnvironment> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.RuntimeEnvironment>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets the path to the system configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 取得系統組態檔的路徑。

trans-unit.source: The path to the system configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 系統組態檔的路徑。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.RuntimeEnvironment.SystemConfigurationFile%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.RuntimeEnvironment.SystemConfigurationFile%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.RuntimeEnvironment>類別。

trans-unit.target: 用來存取檔案和資料夾。
